sources.title: Rainbow Over Texas
sources.description: Title: Rainbow Over Texas Summary: Roy visits his home town while on a personal appearance tour. While there he enters a pony express race. To keep him from winning, bad guys try to sabotage Roy's entry. They fail, or course. Directed by: Frank McDonald Actors: Roy Rogers, Trigger, George Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 9 May 1946 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Saloon owner Haynes has one of his men rob his own place dressed as Jim Pollard. Roy wounds the robber in the arm before he escapes. When Roy finds Pollard he finds him unwounded and hides him out. But later Pollard is brought in shot in the back. Roy must now find the man with the wounded arm.

metadata.Plot: Saloon owner Haynes has one of his men rob his own place dressed as Jim Pollard. Roy wounds the robber in the arm before he escapes.
